com.tranek.chivalryserverbrowser

Class ChivServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tranek.chivalryserverbrowser.ChivServer

  • public class ChivServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Chivalry: Medieval Warfare server.

          java.lang.String maxrank,
          java.lang.String location,
          java.lang.String perspective,
          java.lang.String lat,
          java.lang.String lon)
        Creates a new ChivServer by directly specifying all of the member fields.
        Parameters:
        name - the server's name
        ip - the server's IP address
        queryport - the server's queryport
        gameport - the server's gameport
        map - the server's map
        gamemode - the server's game mode
        ping - the user's ping to the server
        maxplayers - the server's max ping
        currentplayers - the server's current players
        haspassword - whether or not the server has a password
        minrank - the server's minimum rank
        maxrank - the server's maximum rank
        location - the server's location
        perspective - the server's allowed player perspective
        lat - the server's latitude
        lon - the server's longitude

    • Method Detail

      • createChivServer

        public static ChivServer createChivServer(MainWindow mw,
                          java.lang.String ip,
                          int queryport)
        Static method to create a new ChivServer by querying the server directly from its IP address and queryport.
        Parameters:
        mw - reference to the MainWindow to have access to queried servers
        ip - the server's IP address
        queryport - the server's queryport
        Returns:
        a new ChivServer
        See Also:
        QueryServerCondenser.getInfo(), LocationRIPE.getLocation(String), getLocFromOtherServer(String, Vector)

      • clone

        public ChivServer clone()
        Creates a new clone of this ChivServer.
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object

      • getLocation

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getLocation(MainWindow mw,
                                                               java.lang.String ip)
        Gets the location for an IP address. It also adds a slight bit of randomness to its latitude and longitude so that multiple servers in a single data center don't overlap their markers on the map.
        Parameters:
        ip - the IP address for the server
        Returns:
        a HashMap of the location, latitude, and longitude

      • getLocFromOtherServer

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getLocFromOtherServer(java.lang.String location,
                                                                         java.util.Vector<ChivServer> servers)
        Checks if another server with the same location has values for latitude and longitude. If another such server exists, it copies those values from it for itself. This is needed because the RIPE geolocation service sometimes doesn't return a latitude and longitude for some addresses.
        Parameters:
        location - the ChivServer location
        servers - the list of ChivServer to check
        Returns:
        a HashMap of the latitude and longitude; or null if no other server with the same location exists with latitude and longitude data

      • getGameMode

        public static java.lang.String getGameMode(java.lang.String mapname)
        Gets the game mode for a map based on its prefix.
        Parameters:
        mapname - the map name
        Returns:
        the game mode as a string
